text: Mark Shera (born July 10, 1949, Bayonne, New Jersey)tv.com is an American actor, known for his role as J.R. in the television series Barnaby Jones. Shera was cast from 1975 to 1976 in the television series S.W.A.T. in the role of Officer Dominic Luca. He was a guest star on ABC's The Love Boat in 1978, with Janis Paige and Monty Hall playing his parents. ==Filmography== ===Movies=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
